mapper.insert: insert into enterprise(name, img_url, introduction, video_url, detail) values(#{name}, #{imgUrl}, #{introduction}, #{videoUrl}, #{detail})
mapper.select: select ent.enterprise_id, ent.name, ent.img_url, ent.introduction, ent.video_url, ent.detail, br.branch_id 'branches.branch_id', br.name 'branches.name', br.address 'branches.address', br.latitude 'branches.latitude', br.longitude 'branches.longitude', br.telephone 'branches.telephone', lec.lecturer_id 'lecturers.lecturer_id', lec.name 'lecturers.name', lec.photo_url 'lecturers.photo_url', lec.introduction 'lecturers.introduction' from enterprise ent join branch br on ent.enterprise_id = br.enterprise_id join lecturer lec on ent.enterprise_id = lec.enterprise_id join view_available_course a_crs on ent.enterprise_id = a_crs.enterprise_id
mapper.update: update enterprise set name=#{name}, img_url=#{imgUrl}, introduction=#{introduction}, video_url=#{videoUrl}, detail=#{detail} where enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId}
